DOC.brief_title: A School-based Prevention Intervention Promote Wellbeing Preadolescents
DOC.detailed_description: Diario della Salute ( DDS ) school-based prevention intervention base follow theory : 1. social-cognitive theory ( Bandura , 1977 ; 1986 ) 2. theory multiple intelligence ( Gardner , 1987 ) 3. emotional intelligence theory ( Goleman , 1997 ) 4. theory plan behavior ( Ajzen , 1991 ) 5. transtheoretical model change ( Prochaska , Diclemente , 1982 ; 1992 ) . DDS compose : 1. tool child parent health social emotional well-being issue : 1. diary teen tell story four same-age student ( e.g . experiment risky behavior , conflict feeling thought , need independence control ) , 2. diary parent tell experience mum dad teenage child ( e.g . problem relationship teenage child , family conflict , parental disappointment , etc . ) ; 2. five highly-standardized interactive lesson ( 2-4 hour ) health issue administer previously train teacher . Assignment school study arm ( DDS intervention vs. intervention ) cluster-randomized . Schools match number student average socioeconomic status . In study area school allocate chance , analyze separately school . Two anonymous survey focus main outcome ( wellbeing , tobacco smoking , alcohol , physical activity diet ) intervention . Pre post survey link anonymous code ( Galanti , 2006 ) .
